sentences: Spencer Susser (born 1977) is an American film director, screenwriter and producer.

His short film I Love Sarah Jane, featuring Mia Wasikowska, won Best Narrative Short at the 2008 Nashville Film Festival, the Reel Frontier Merit Award at the Arizona International Film Festival, and the Canal+ Award at the Clermont-Ferrand International Short Film Festival.
In February 2011, it was reported that Susser is developing a feature-length film based on the short.
Susser co-directed the music video for Lana Del Rey's song "Summertime Sadness" with Kyle Newman.
